step.description:
Earn **5 POINTS** by Sending Messages in Channels!

Starting conversations and increasing interaction among our community members is one of our top priorities! You will earn points for each message that meets specific criteria!

Introduce Yourself and Earn **35 POINTS**!

Getting to know each other, expanding our network, and maybe finding group members for our projects! We believe that introducing yourself is very important for this. Don't forget to introduce yourself in the **#introduce-yourself** channel!

Don't Forget to Ask Questions! You can Earn **40 POINTS** by Asking Questions.

We have a dedicated **#qna** channel where community members can ask their questions. You will earn points for every question you ask here.

Don't Hesitate to Share Your Knowledge and Get **50 POINTS**!

Sharing is one of the core values of Kodluyoruz! If you share resources that can help other community members, you will collect points. You can make these contributions in the **#showcase** channel.

Hang Out with Your Friends in Voice Rooms! Earn **2 POINTS** per Minute.

You will earn points for every minute you spend actively in voice rooms with your friends!

Invite Your Friends and Earn **100 POINTS**!

You can invite your friends to the system using your referral code. When your friend enters by using the **!referral** command, both you and your friend can earn extra points.

builder.description: Provides information about your current points status.
builder.name: point

userPoints.description:
Dear <@{{id}}>, in the points system between {{period}}, your total points you have achieved so far is
**[{{points}} points, and you are ranked {{place}}!](https://kodluyoruz.org)**

firstEntry.author: {{name}} Point Bot
firstEntry.title: Welcome to the {{name}} Point Bot Help Menu
firstEntry.description: You can read the documentation and start the setup using the buttons below before getting started.

done.label: Go to Admin Channel
done.title: Setup Completed
done.description: You can continue to other settings from the admin channel.

errors.sendMessageError:
Failed to send message to {{channel}} channel.
Guild: {{guild.name}}({{guild.id}}) - {error}
errors.typeError:
The {{logChannelId}} channel with {{channel}} setting is not a text channel.
Guild: {{guild.name}}({{guild.id}})

leaderBoard.footer:
We congratulate the winners and thank each of our friends for their efforts.
**Remember, you are the one who will be in this row tomorrow!**
leaderBoard.title: {{period}} Winners

builder.name: referral
builder.description: You can use this command for referral number operations.

embed.success:
You have accepted the invitation from {{- referrer}}.


$t(referral.embed.default)
embed.userNotFound:
Invitation code or user not found.


$t(referral.embed.default)
embed.alreadyReferred:
You have already registered to the server with the reference of user {{- referrer}}.


$t(referral.embed.default)
embed.error: An error has occurred or the invite system is not yet active on the server.

askQuestion.description:
Congratulations!
Dear **{{name}}**,
You contacted with people on the {{channel}} channel for any questions you may have and
You won {{roomPoint}}!
Between {{period}}
**[your total score is {{points}} and you are ranked {{place}}!](https://kodluyoruz.org)**

introduceYourself.description:
Congratulations!
Dear **{{name}}**,
You won {{roomPoint}} for your network start step on {{channel}} channel!
Between {{period}}
**[your total score is {{points}} and you are ranked {{place}}!](https://kodluyoruz.org)**

refText.referred: completed the quest **{{point.type.title}}** by inviting their friend <@{{data.referred}}>.
refText.referrer: invited by their friend <@{{data.referrer}}>, they completed the quest **{{point.type.title}}**.

embed.suffix: by gaining **{{givenPoints}}** points, they reached **{{totalPoints}}** points and **{{rank}}**.

type.text:
$t(pointLog.embed.prefix) completed their quest **{{point.type.title}}** by sending a message in the text channel.
$t(pointLog.embed.suffix)
type.voice:
$t(pointLog.embed.prefix) completed their **{{point.type.title}}** quest after **{{value}} minute(s)** spent on the voice channel.
$t(pointLog.embed.suffix)

pointUnit.author: {{name}} Points Bot
pointUnit.description:
**Welcome to Point Units**

Hello our dear moderator,
You can organize point systems that will increase social and cultural sharing among users who add value to Kodluyoruz through the points unit.
pointUnit.title: Kodluyoruz Points Bot

reference.description:
Congratulations!
Dear **{{name}}**,
With the /reference command, your friend {{member}} joined Kodluyoruz and
We are excited for what you and your friend will contribute.
You earned {{roomPoint}} points!
Between {{period}}
**[your total score is {{points}} and you are ranked {{place}}!](https://kodluyoruz.org)**

sendMessageToChannel.description:
Congratulations!
Dear **{{name}}**,
You earned {{roomPoint}} for the message you sent to {{channel}}!
Between {{period}}
**[your total score is {{points}} and you are ranked {{place}}!](https://kodluyoruz.org)**

soundRoom.description:
Congratulations!
Dear **{{name}}**,
The time you spent on {{channel}} is {{spendingTime}}
The minutes you spare to develop/improve at Kodluyoruz are valuable to us.
Because it is valuable, you earn {{roomPoint}}, 2 points every minute!
Between {{period}}
**[your total score is {{points}} and you are ranked {{place}}!](https://kodluyoruz.org)**

transferOfInformation.description:
Congratulations!
Dear **{{name}}**,
Thank you for your shares on the #{{channel}} channel for adding value to Kodluyoruz members, you earned {{roomPoint}} points!
Between {{period}}
**[your total score is {{points}} and you are ranked {{place}}!](https://kodluyoruz.org)**
